summary: A composite wrapper that aggregates several ControlNet instances into a single model interface, handling their collective loading, saving, and forward execution so a diffusion UNet can receive multiple conditioning signals at once.
business_intent: Facilitates multiâ€‘modal conditioning in diffusion pipelines, allowing developers to combine diverse control inputs (e.g., depth, pose, segmentation) without managing separate models, thereby streamlining integration and enhancing generative flexibility.
